pageContext.claim: “They just reported there were no -- what would you call them, the rubber bullets or whatever. There was none of that used. They just moved it back. They didn't know until just shortly before that I was going there.”
pageContext.analysis: Authorities used tear gas and PepperBalls to disperse peaceful protesters outside the White House, clearing a path for Trump to walk over to a nearby church for a photo op during protests over the police killing of George Floyd. PepperBalls are not the same as rubber bullets, but both are projectile munitions designed to cause pain on impact. PepperBalls, in addition, release a chemical irritant.
